pageContext.claim: “You know, the left plays a tougher game, it’s very funny. I actually think that the people on the right are tougher, but they don’t play it tougher. Okay? I can tell you I have the support of the police, the support of the military, the support of the Bikers for Trump – I have the tough people, but they don’t play it tough — until they go to a certain point, and then it would be very bad, very bad. But the left plays it cuter and tougher. Like with all the nonsense that they do in Congress … with all this investigations]—that’s all they want to do is – you know, they do things that are nasty. Republicans never played this.”
pageContext.analysis: Leaving aside Trump's suggestive comments about his "tough" supporters going "to a certain point," Republicans in Congress launched a series of investigations into the Obama administration.
